title: A radical and counterintuitive proposition to save democracy: forgiveness
description: Many of our political differences and disagreements fall away if we believe there are two camps we can join now: people who want to preserve our democracy and those whose behavior and rhetoric threaten to destroy it.

title: History shows that no ceasefire or treaty with Russia can be trusted
description: The Russian Federation has no regard for international norms and regulations and therefore no credibility in making agreements.

title: Michelle Obama wins second Grammy
description: Michelle Obama is a two-time Grammy Award winner, besting other high-profile nominees including Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.) and Meryl Streep. The former first lady took home a Grammy on Sunday during the awards preshow in the Best Audio Book, Narration and Storytelling Recording category for the audiobook of her 2022 self-help-style memoir, “The Light We…
